column4: hello, i'm helping my brother and he didn't migrate yet to intrepid...but he's got a problem: apt-get was interupted while installing a package and it now says: dpkg was interrupted you must manually run dpkg configure a to correct the problem...but i must reconfigure which package...if i do a dpkg-reconfigure tilp2 it says that tilp2 is not installed...
no that will make dpkg functional again
